alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 20 at 9:54PM CDT until September 20 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Buffalo County in west central Wisconsin... Northern Trempealeau County in west central Wisconsin... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 953 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Durand, or 10 miles northwest of Mondovi, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mondovi around 1010 PM CDT. Strum around 1030 PM CDT. Whitehall around 1045 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 94 between mile markers 88 and 91. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
